A simple regular furnace is not enough for the practice of witchcraft. Indeed, a specifically designed oven made out of iron is needed (it looking much more stylish is an added plus).
Such oven functions as a

regular furnace in that it will require fuel to burn various burnables; however, it also has a specific slot for $(item)clay jars$() which allows you to collect different byproducts, magical or otherwise.$(2br)$(o)Just... don't cook any children in it...$()
